.
SAH or SHA Claims Based on Paired Organs or Extremities
Even though compensation may be payable under
38 CFR 3.383
, claimants do not qualify for SAH or SHA grants if they suffered a loss of paired SC and non-service-connected (NSC) organs or extremities.
